actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To extend the jurisdiction of the Interstate Commerce Commission to include approval of the acquisition of control of certain rail carriers by persons that are not carriers.

summary.text: Declares that control of a class I rail carrier may be acquired, with the approval of the Interstate Commerce Commission, by a person that is not a carrier.

titles.title: To extend the jurisdiction of the Interstate Commerce Commission to include approval of the acquisition of control of certain rail carriers by persons that are not carriers.
